properties.name: spring.cloud.nacos.config.encode
properties.description: default encode for nacos config content.

properties.name: spring.cloud.nacos.config.prefix
properties.description: the prefix of dataId, nacos config data meta info. dataId = prefix + '-' + ${spring.active.profile} + `.` + ${spring.cloud.nacos.config.file-extension}.

properties.name: spring.cloud.nacos.config.file-extension
properties.description: the suffix of nacos config dataId, also the file extension of config content, only support properties now.

properties.name: spring.cloud.nacos.config.shared-dataids
properties.description: the dataids for configurable multiple shared configurations , multiple separated by commas .

properties.name: spring.cloud.nacos.config.refresh-enabled
properties.description: the master switch for refresh configuration, it default opened(true).

properties.name: spring.cloud.nacos.config.username
properties.description: nacos config service's userName to authenticate.

properties.name: spring.cloud.nacos.config.password
properties.description: nacos config service's password to authenticate.

properties.name: spring.cloud.nacos.config.timeout
properties.description: timeout for get config from nacos.

properties.name: spring.cloud.nacos.config.maxRetry
properties.description: nacos maximum number of tolerable server reconnection errors.

properties.name: spring.cloud.nacos.config.group
properties.description: nacos config group, group is config data meta info.

properties.name: spring.cloud.nacos.config.masterStandbyServerTaskDelay
properties.description: nacos config center master standby node health check interval time.

properties.name: spring.cloud.nacos.config.retryMasterServerEnabled
properties.description: whether retry master node when the master node is isolated.
